Query: How do I get the parent process ID of a given child process?

Answers.MP Summary: look up or signal processes based on name and other attributes

Top-3 Scripts:
so_52508561: #!/usr/bin/env bash

node foo.js &
pid=$!

sleep 5;

pgrep -P $pid | xargs kill -INT

Explanations about Options.-f:
The pattern is normally only matched against the process name. When -f is set, the
 full command line is used.
Explanations about Options.-P: Only match processes whose parent process ID is listed.
